summary: Provides utility routines for converting various graph data formats—such as edge lists, NetworkX graphs, and SciPy sparse matrices—into tensor representations compatible with the DGL framework, and includes helpers for inferring node counts and moving tensors to the appropriate compute device.
business_intent: Enable seamless preprocessing of graph datasets for deep learning workflows by translating common graph structures into DGL-ready tensors and handling device placement, thereby simplifying model input preparation.
